column4: Anybody know why Ubuntu 11.04 doesnt want to be installed? Downloaded .iso from web and burned it to a disc. When I boot from disc it goes 10 seconds nicely. Then I get message "uncompression errror, system halted" :(
check the disk is burned proper
sounds 99% like a bad copy
yes, either that or bad ram
its only recommended because 32 bit works on all cpus so it's not to confuse noobs
99% of apps work on 64 bit
if u have 4gb of ram use 64
whats the matter
what was ur original problem? the uncompress error? or was that someone else?
no, it was me
im 99% sure its bad ram or an unstable overclock
what u mean
u prob upped ur voltage randomly like a noob lol
it could be anything
so it actually shuts down and reboots properly, by itself?
so it doesnt shutdown properly just "resets"
but why pay money for a macbook and use ubuntu?
yes along side with mac os if its possible
go for it
most people dont care
i think im one of them
dont care
tbh it depends
